tool_description: API reveals the latest news in the cryptocurrency industry
name: Cryptocurrency news
title: Cryptocurrency news

api_list.name: Get News From a Specific Source
api_list.description: Get news about cryptocurrency from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cryptocurrency News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about cryptocurrency from all over the world
